sentence.Network_en: The matter should not be hushed up, but freely ventilated.
sentence.Network_cn: 这事不应掩盖起来, 而应该公开自由讨论.

sentence.Network_en: The scandal was hushed up in an effort to save face.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了不丢人,没有把这一丑闻张扬出去.

sentence.Network_en: They hushed up the scandal in an effort to save face.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们掩盖了丑闻以图保全面子.

list.abs: 带up的词组以及例句_百度知道 ... hot up 加热, 热闹 hush up 肃静,隐瞒,掩遮 hype up 强行刺激使...热烈起来.

means.word_mean: 1. (used of information or news) kept secret by using influence;
